page_content: The page is about a workshop for students on comic drawing.
The page discusses an extraordinary siren test conducted due to technical issues in the central siren control system.
The page discusses the replacement of a payroll and personnel management system due to outdated standards and operational risks.
The page provides information and PDF guides about ePlanung, a digital service for regional planning.
The page discusses the elevated risk of flooding in the Kanton Aargau due to heavy rainfall.
The page discusses the successful implementation of SAP software for financial accounting and human resources in Kanton Aargau.
The page discusses the metrics and indicators used to monitor the progress of climate strategy in Kanton Aargau.
